author: madeof_tin7509
content: Not sure why this isn't auto merging. Is there something i'm missing?

author: madeof_tin7509
content: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3563

author: sky.cactus
content: Hmm, multiple problems.

author: sky.cactus
content: You are changing the status, which cannot be auto-merged.  The new bot didn't go red like it should have (cc <@104006934562107392>) and the old bot didn't run at all.

author: alita85
content: <@!301186049323958275> what are the allowed statuses to be changed to?

author: alita85
content: if any

author: sky.cactus
content: User can only freely merge to Withdrawn.

author: sky.cactus
content: (I think that is what it is called)

author: sky.cactus
content: Everything else requires an editor review.

author: sky.cactus
content: I guess Last Call => Review would be OK to auto-merge as well.

author: alita85
content: okay, i'll add that

author: madeof_tin7509
content: Should it be okay to go from DRAFT -> REVIEW without editor approval?

author: madeof_tin7509
content: If it makes it to Draft then it should be formated and such correctly already

author: madeof_tin7509
content: So that an EIP is ready and requested to be reviewed seems it could be Author discretion as well.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: Well shit. Can I get a Merge then? cc <@!543900561460822016>

author: sky.cactus
content: No.

author: sky.cactus
content: We are much more strict about each stage.

author: sky.cactus
content: Draft basically just requires you have the form filled out correctly.

author: sky.cactus
content: Draft -> Review requires you follow a bunch of other rules.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: Ahhh, okay. Thats fine then

author: sky.cactus
content: Review -> Last Call requires that your EIP is flawless quality.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: Got it

author: madeof_tin7509
content: Should I revert to DRAFT and let it automerge first then?

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, sometimes people will take a well formatted draft and ruin it while iterating on it before review.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: That I believe

author: sky.cactus
content: You don't have to.  Only reason I haven't merged was to give Alita a chance to look to see why the bot didn't block it like it should.

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, I'm *super* busy and have 60+ emails to go through.  ðŸ˜–

author: madeof_tin7509
content: okay, np.

content: We can let Alita take a look and i'll ping Lightclient later ðŸ™‚
